ecosia | Tree Planting DevOps Engineer | Berlin, Germany | ONSITE, VISA, www.ecosia.org

We are looking for a passionate full-stack developer, with a focus on DevOps to join us in Berlin! This is a great opportunity to become part of an inspiring team and shape a product used by millions of users.
